content: अदंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Toothless. {@--2@} Not yet having the teeth formed or grown (said of young ones of men or animals before the teething time). {@--3@} Ending in अत् or अ. --तः {@--1@} A leech. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pūṣan, one of the 12 Ādityas, he having lost his teeth at the destruction of Dakṣa's sacrifice by Vīrabhadra.
